menu.title: Pending Allocations
menu.description: View Seasons that haven't been allocated a timeslot yet.

menu.title: My Shows
menu.description: View a list of all your shows, where you can edit them and apply for seasons.

menu.title: This Term's Shows
menu.description: View a list of all shows with a season this term.

menu.title: All Shows
menu.description: View a list of all shows since time began.

menu.title: Create a Show
menu.description: Create a new show on the URY Scheduler.

menu.title: Add Training Session
menu.description: Add a training slot that newbies can sign up to.

menu.title: Manage Terms
menu.description: Seasons are applied to in relation to Terms. Manage Terms here.
